mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ss_gallery (subject,contents,category,url,saveFileName, savedFileName, originalFileName, thumburl, regdate,updatedate) VALUES (#{subject},#{contents},#{category},#{url},#{saveFileName},#{savedFileName},#{originalFileName}, #{thumburl}, now(),now());
mapper.select: SELECT count(idx) as idx from ss_gallery where idx > 0
SELECT count(idx) as idx from ss_gallery WHERE showYn = 'y';
SELECT max(idx) as idx from ss_gallery where idx > 0
SELECT * from ss_gallery where idx > 0 and showYn = 'y' order by idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
SELECT * from ss_gallery where idx > 0 and showYn = 'y' order by idx desc limit 3;
SELECT count(idx) FROM ss_gallery where idx > 0 and showYn = 'y'
SELECT * FROM ss_gallery where idx = #{idx} and showYn = 'y'
mapper.update: UPDATE ss_gallery SET subject = #{subject}, contents = #{contents}, url = #{url}, category = #{category}, saveFileName = #{saveFileName}, originalFileName = #{originalFileName}, savedFileName = #{savedFileName}, thumburl = #{thumburl}, updatedate = now() WHERE idx = #{idx} and showYn = 'y'
UPDATE ss_gallery SET showYn = 'n' WHERE idx = #{idx}
